original_text: Yet you are as wild as the sea. You had sex with your father's slave wife. This bad thing brought me shame. So you will not become great.
korean_text: 물의 끓음 같았은즉 너는 탁월하지 못하리니 네가 아버지의 침상에 올라 더럽혔음이로다 그가 내 침상에 올랐었도다

sentences.original_text: Yet you are as wild as the sea.
You had sex with your father's slave wife.
This bad thing brought me shame.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 나쁜 일이 나에게 수치를 주었다.

sentences.original_text: So you will not become great.
